head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CONBOY, R. KEVIN

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CONBOY, R. KEVIN

block.p: CONBOY--R. Kevin, Attorney, of Yorktown Heights NY, on January 27th, 2007. Son of the late Raymond and Rose Conboy. Beloved husband of Peggy, adored father of Patrick, Megan, Katy, Shannon, and Danny. Loving grandfather of Mairead, Casey, Bridget and Molly. Beloved brother of Kathy, Pat, Maureen, Billy, Jeanne, Michael, Peter and Jimmy. Loved and cherished by a large extended family, including nieces, nephews, cousins and in-laws. Information on Services, Clark's Funeral Home, 914-962-3333.
